info.name: API
info.description:
# Introduction
This is an API for restaurant management APP, built as a take-home assignment

request.description: Create a new measurement unit. Each measurement unit must have a unique name, creating a measurement unit with an existing name will result in failure (409 response)

response.name: Create measurement unit [FAIL: resource already exists]

request.description: Get all available measurement units in database
Delete a measurement unit. If the measurement unit is still being used by one or more ingredients, the operation will fail (409 response)

response.name: Delete measurement unit [FAIL: resource is still needed by other resource(s)]
Delete measurement unit [FAIL: resource not found]

request.description: Updates a measurement unit's properties. Renaming the measurement unit's name to an existing name will result in failure (409 response)

response.name: Update measurement unit [FAIL: resource not found]

request.description: Assign a measurement unit to one or more ingredients.
Create a new ingredient type. Each ingredient type must have a unique name, creating an ingredient type with an existing name will result in failure (409 response)
Get all available ingredient types in database.
Deletea an ingredient type. If the ingredient type is still being used by one or more ingredients, the operation will fail (409 response)

response.name: Delete ingredient type [FAIL: ingredients assigned not zero]

request.description: Update an ingredient type's properties. Renaming the ingredient type's name to an existing name will result in failure (409 response)
Assign an ingredient type to one or more ingredients.
Create a new ingredient state. Each ingredient state must have a unique name, creating a ingredient state with an existing name will result in failure (409 response)
Get all available ingredient states in database.
Delete an ingredient state. If the ingredient state is still being used by one or more ingredients, the operation will fail (409 response)

response.name: Delete ingredient state [FAIL: resource not found]

request.description: Update an ingredient state's properties.
Assign an ingredient state to one or more ingredients.
Create a new ingrdient. Each ingredient must have a unique name, creating an igredient with an existing name will result in failure (409 response)

response.name: Create ingredient [FAIL: one of the resources is not found]

request.description: Get all available ingredients in database.
Delete an ingredient. Be careful when deleting an ingredient as it will also delete every infow entries related to that ingredient.
Update an ingredient's properties.

Create a new inflow entry. The quantity will be rounded to the correct precision (e.g the decimal places) according to the measurement unit used by the related ingredient. The current stock of the related ingredient will be added by the rounded quantity.
Get all available inflows in database.
Delete an inflow entry. Deleting an inflow entry will decrease the current stock of the related ingredient by the quantity described in the inflow entry.

response.name: Delete inflow entry [FAIL: resource not found]
